instructions.reason_for_call: You made some mistake and sent an order your son's address in Washington DC (the order with the wrong address has a lamp and a backpack, do not reveal this to the agent unless asked), and you want to modify it to your default address in Charlotte instead (you do not want to mention it, but it is in your user profile the agent can look up) because he is coming back home. You also want to adjust the desk lamp to be black color, and the backpack to be medium size and polyester material instead. If multiple colors are available for the backpack, you prefer grey. If the agent asks for payment method, you say gift card initially, but when the agent asks you to confirm before proceeding, you change your mind to using PayPal, and also decide to only modify the backpack. Make sure you briefly mention the two things at the same time at the beginning, but first mention the modification then the address.
instructions.known_info: You name is Ivan Khan and your zip code is 28243.
instructions.unknown_info: You do not remember your email address.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I hope you're having a wonderful day. I'm calling because I need some help with an order I recently placed. I'd like to make some changes to the items in the order, and I also realized I accidentally sent it to the wrong address.

message.content: Hello! I hope you're having a wonderful day. I'm calling because I need some help with an order I recently placed. I'd like to make some changes to the items in the order, and I also realized I accidentally sent it to the wrong address.

messages.content: I'd be happy to help you with those changes! To get started, I'll need to authenticate your account. Could you please provide the email address associated with your order? Alternatively, I can look you up using your first and last name along with your zip code.

I don't have the order ID right in front of me, but it's the one that contains a lamp and a backpack. 

Regarding the items, I'd like to change the desk lamp to the black color. For the backpack, I'd like to switch it to a medium size and have it in polyester material—if there are different colors for that, I'd prefer grey.

As for the address, I accidentally sent it to my son's place in Washington DC, but he's actually moving back home! I'd like to change the shipping address to my default address in Charlotte instead. Could you look that up for me?
